casebody.data:
Yreva MUHAMMAD, Personal Representative of the Estate of Robert Muhammad, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
William GRESLEY, Matthew Kamps, Sebastien Lebon, Bertrand Thibault, Michael Champrenault, Daniel Moore, and Nicolas Pelfrene, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 159566
159567
COA: 341745, 343236 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 24, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendants-appellees to extend the time for filing their answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before July 3, 2019.
